title: Course Selection
content: I am from ECE. If I am currently doing a minor course which has 5 credits per semester. So now can I withdraw one of my ECE subjects per semester?

comments.body: Nope. A minor course can't be used to substitute for your major degree. Since you're in ECE, all of your core courses count to your total ECE credits. Your minor course credits count to whatever your minor is.
Minor course has nothing to do with your degree. You've essentially signed up for a second degree.
